content.raw: @_jrivero_  Any chance what we could separate into two binary releases: ```gazebo4``` and ```gazebo4-extended```? The latter release would include all extensions that  require third party libraries, like GDAL. In this way users of minimal systems like libfreexl-dev could pull the minimal versions, while those of us who want to milk Gazebo for everything it's worth can do so :)
